Quality Education.reason: The course's primary goal is to provide 'basic political science knowledge' and help students 'make rational thinking and objective judgment,' directly contributing to higher education.

協助學生建立觀察政治現象的思考架構 (assist students in establishing a thinking framework for observing political phenomena)
